longBusinessSummary: McHenry Bancorp, Inc. operates as a holding company for Mchenry Savings Bank that provides various banking products and services. It offers personal, health savings, business, and commercial accounts; personal online accounts; EZdeposits; personal and commercial CDs and savings; money market products; and sweep accounts The company also provides home equity, consumer, commercial, and construction loans; lines of credit; and mortgages. In addition, it offers investment services; mobile banking, fund management, deposit ATM, safe deposit box, teller, check imaging and ordering, direct depositing, and ATM/debit and commercial card services. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Mchenry, Illinois.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Douglas D. Howe
